Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 船員
Entry.EnglishText: Sailor

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ダナ
Entry.EnglishText: Dana

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンから来た男
Entry.EnglishText: Man from Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: リフトの管理人
Entry.EnglishText: Lift Caretaker

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度ばかりは、 ワルトゥとの直接対決も 避けられないかもしれない。 気を引き締めて行くぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: We may not be able to avoid a direct confrontation with Walto this time. Be prepared for anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、絶対に姉貴たちを 助けてみせるぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, we're gonna rescue my sister and the other girls for sure!

Entry.JapaneseText: 間に合ってくれ…… <Claire>……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope we're not too late, <Claire>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 定期船は欠航となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: Regular boat service is currently cancelled.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 定期船のご利用料金は 一律<nmb:12C>ガルドです。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>You seem to be short of money. The fee for embarking is a flat rate of <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>定期船をご利用なさいますか？ 料金は一律<nmb:12C>ガルドです。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Do you want to embark? The fee is <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>定期船を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Embark? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ港
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ港
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス港
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: 定期船に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Don't Embark

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス港
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>定期船で<unk18:48D00428B8048880>に移動します。 料金<nmb:12C>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>To travel to <unk18:48D00428B8048880> the rate is <nmb:12C> Gald Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、ダナ。 こんなところで何を？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Dana! What are you doing in a place like this?
...Huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>……戒律だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっと……そっか、 そうだったよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, right... I forgot about those.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……皆さん…… いらしてたんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, hello everyone. So, you've come back here...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があったんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did something happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: 祭司にふさわしいのは ヒューマかガジュマかで、 争いになったんです。
Entry.EnglishText: There was a dispute over whether a Huma or a Gajuma would make a more suitable priest.

Entry.JapaneseText: 前はこんな事なかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: There's never been such an issue before, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここでもそんな事が……
Entry.EnglishText: So there's been problems here, as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: それで、ヒューマたちは 私たちガジュマを港側へ追い出して、 聖殿を独占してしまったんです。
Entry.EnglishText: Then the Huma drove us Gajuma down into the port side of the city and took over the temple.

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかして、 登山洞が通行止めになってるのは……
Entry.EnglishText: So is that why the Climber's Cavern is impassible...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ…… 私たちを山頂に来させないよう、 ヒューマがやったんだと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I think the Huma did that so that we wouldn't be able to reach the mountaintop.

Entry.JapaneseText: 登山洞から入れば、 山頂に行けるじゃないですか。
Entry.EnglishText: It should be possible to reach the mountain's summit if you go through the Climber's Cavern, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: それが……ヒューマたちは 私たちが上がってこられないよう、 道をふさいでしまったんです。
Entry.EnglishText: Well... The Huma have blocked the path off in order to prevent us from climbing to the top.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、軍の方々が、復旧作業を しているみたいですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: There seems to be military personnel currently in the process of fixing it, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: オックスさんも山の上？
Entry.EnglishText: Is Ochs at the summit?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……私たち、 街を出ようって約束してたのに、 こんな事になってしまって……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... Why did this have to happen when we had just promised each other that we were going to leave this city together...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 登山洞の復旧を待って 山頂に行こうと思っていた ところなんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm starting to think that I'll have to wait until the restoration is complete before I'll be able to go to the summit, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: やめなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't be ridiculous.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマがヒューマを 好きじゃいけませんか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why, because you think that a Gajuma can't be in love with a Huma?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……街を出るのだって、 あなたみたいな人がいるから……！
Entry.EnglishText: People like you are the very reason why we want out of this town!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちがなんとかする。
Entry.EnglishText: We'll take care of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 登山洞にはバイラスもいるわ。 ……あんたは、ここで待ってて。
Entry.EnglishText: But there are Biruses in the Climber's Cavern. You should wait here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん……？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>...?

Entry.JapaneseText: おいおい、なんとかするったって、 登山洞はふさがってるんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: C'mon, I know we want to help them, but isn't the Cavern a no-go?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>... You're up.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、頼もしーッ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>'s got it!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行きましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん…… あなた……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... I beg of you...
Entry.Notes: I don't think this is quite right, in context. Cause Hilda has already agreed to help. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: ……お願いします。 山側へ行けるようになったら、 私もすぐに行くと、オックスに……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Please. As soon as you can get to the mountainside, I'll be there and let Ochs know that...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like we can't speak to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...The commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>……かぁ。 そういう話はさ、普通の船乗りよりも、 海賊たちのほうが詳しいんじゃないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>, huh? I think the pirates would know more about that kind of stuff than us regular sailors, wouldn't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: ほら、海賊って、無人島に行ったり、 海に潜ったりして、お宝を探すだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Because, well, pirates go to deserted islands and dive into the sea to look for treasure, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊の宝ねえ……ん？ どっかでそんな話を 聞いたような気が……
Entry.EnglishText: Pirates? Treasure? I think I've heard that somewhere...
Entry.Notes: marking problematic just in case this is kol dialogue. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 気のせいかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: Am I just making it all up, or...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊の宝……
Entry.EnglishText: Pirate's Treasure...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>？ さあ、オレは知らないなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>? Hmm, don't think I've heard of it...

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かベルサスに、伝説の海賊の 子孫がいるって聞いた事があるけど、 そいつなら知ってるかもね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure I've heard that there's a descendant of a legendary pirate in Belsas, maybe that guy would know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊の子孫……
Entry.EnglishText: A legendary pirate's descendant...

Entry.JapaneseText: 港の住民は皆、広場に避難している。 バイラスに注意するんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: All the inhabitants of the harbor have taken refuge in the square. Beware of the Birus Outbreak!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは許せんな……！ ホントにムカムカする！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never forgive the Huma! I hate their guts!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと目が合っただけで、 いきなり海に突き落とされたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Our eyes met for only a second, and the next thing I know I was being shoved into the ocean!

Entry.JapaneseText: おかげで風邪っぽくてさ…… ヘックショイ！
Entry.EnglishText: I think I caught a cold from that... *Achoo!*

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマを見ると、急に 腹が立って来る時が…… あるんだよ、このヒューマ！
Entry.EnglishText: Sometimes when I see a Huma, I feel unable to control my rage. Urgh... Y-You! Huma...!

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いけない…… 蒼の聖殿へ行って、 心を鎮めて来なきゃ……！
Entry.EnglishText: N-No, I mustn't! I must visit the Azure Sanctuary and calm my mind...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>というと、 その昔、伝説のアイフリードっていう海賊が そういうものを見たっていう話だよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Blue>The Island of Illusions<White> is a story about a legendary pirate named Aifread who saw something like that on his adventures.
Entry.Notes: clunky. -dragon maybe: "There's a story about the legendar pirate Aifread finding an Island of Illusions during one of his many adventures."

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……また聞きのまた聞きだから、 確かな話じゃないけどさ、 今もどこかにその地図があるんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: At least, that's what I've heard, and the details vary depending on who's telling the story, too. Still, I know there's a map leading to it somewhere!

Entry.JapaneseText: 時々、ヒューマの事で 無性に腹が立って来るんだけど…… 別に、争うつもりは……ない……
Entry.EnglishText: Sometimes I get irresistibly furious around Huma... Despite that, I... I really... don't want to fight...!
Entry.Notes: I think this is just wrong. Seems like a kol moment. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城で、ジルバ様が 演説したんだってね！
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Lady Zilva gave a speech at Castle Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカから来るガジュマはみんな、 感動したって言ってたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: All the Gajuma from Balka said they were very impressed.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、戦うっていうのは、 ちょっと大げさだよなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Still, that bit about fighting... That was pouring it on a bit thick, I think...

Entry.JapaneseText: 時々、ヒューマの事で 無性に腹が立って来るんだけど…… 別に、争うつもりは……ない……
Entry.EnglishText: Sometimes I get irresistibly furious around Huma... Despite that, I... I really... don't want to fight...!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか街側を追い出されたって ガジュマたちが騒いでたね。 まったく……同情するよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure what it is, but I'm sure it's gotta be something. I really do feel sorry for them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 前は、ヒューマに腹が立っても、 蒼の聖殿に行けば、少しは気分が 鎮まっていたのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Before, even if I held resentment towards the Huma, I could go to the Azure Sanctuary and I'd feel a little better...

Entry.JapaneseText: 山の上に行けないようになったから、 かなりストレスがたまってるよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Now that I can't go up the mountain, I'm feeling pretty stressed out...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か起こっても、ヒューマが 悪いんだ……忘れるなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: If something happens, it's all the Huma's fault... Don't you ever forget that...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんとか丸く収まったみたいで よかったじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: It's good to see that you've managed to come full circle.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、他の街も、なんだか キナくさいみたいだね。
Entry.EnglishText: But the rest of the city seems to be kind of quaint, too.
Entry.Notes: this doesn't make sense with the prior sentence. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが悪いって わけでもなかったか……
Entry.EnglishText: It wasn't as if Huma were the bad ones...

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、こういう事には 誤解がつきものさね。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, there are always misunderstandings in these types of situations, aren't there?

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、バイラスがちょくちょく 街に出るらしいよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that the Birus have been going rampant in town lately...

Entry.JapaneseText: 天変地異の前触れかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if this is a harbinger of something like a natural disaster...

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴り……もしかして、 バイラスのうなり声じゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: This rumbling... Could be the roar of a Birus...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前からイヤな予感がしてたけど、 ちょっと怖いなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I've had a bad feeling about this for quite a while, and it's a little scary...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダが沈んだそうじゃないか！ キョグエンは大丈夫なのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Razilda sank! I wonder if Kyogen is okay...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配だけど、船賃ないしな……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm worried about the city, but I can't afford the boat fare...

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン、ミナール、 サニイタウン、バルカ…… そしてバビログラード……
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen, Minal Sunnytown, Balka And Babilograd.
Entry.Notes: this sentence and the one below don't quite flow. I want them checked. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々回ったけど、 そろそろ故郷が懐かしい…… 帰ろっかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been around a lot. It's time to go back. You know what? I think I will go home...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも帰りの船賃ないしな……
Entry.EnglishText: But I don't have the money for the boat ride home...

Entry.JapaneseText: 船に乗るかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Shall we set sail?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>船に乗りますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Want to embark? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: リフトに乗るかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Want on the lift?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>リフトに乗りますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Will you ride the lift? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
